mapper.insert: insert into member (m_email, m_name, m_gender, m_profile) values (#{mEmail}, #{mName}, #{mGender}, #{mProfile})

-- 주문내역 개수 -- SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST SUB_LF JOIN SUBSCRIPTION SUB on SUB_LF.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = SUB.SUBSCRIPTION_ID WHERE SUB.M_ID = #{memberId}

-- 배송 준비 SELECT count(*) as STATUS_COUNT FROM DELIVERY D JOIN LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST SUB_LF on D.SUB_LF_ID = SUB_LF.SUB_LF_ID JOIN SUBSCRIPTION S on SUB_LF.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = S.SUBSCRIPTION_ID WHERE S.M_ID = #{memberId} and D.DELIVERY_STATUS = 0

-- 배송 중 SELECT count(*) as STATUS_COUNT FROM DELIVERY D JOIN LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST SUB_LF on D.SUB_LF_ID = SUB_LF.SUB_LF_ID JOIN SUBSCRIPTION S on SUB_LF.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = S.SUBSCRIPTION_ID WHERE S.M_ID = #{memberId} and D.DELIVERY_STATUS = 1

-- 배송 완료 SELECT count(*) as STATUS_COUNT FROM DELIVERY D JOIN LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST SUB_LF on D.SUB_LF_ID = SUB_LF.SUB_LF_ID JOIN SUBSCRIPTION S on SUB_LF.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = S.SUBSCRIPTION_ID WHERE S.M_ID = #{memberId} and D.DELIVERY_STATUS = 2
-- 스탠다드 구독 id 조회 select sub.SUBSCRIPTION_ID from SUBSCRIPTION sub where sub.M_ID = #{memberId} and sub.SUBSCRIBE_TYPE = 0 and sub.SUBSCRIBE_STATUS = 1
